name: Como
description:
Dr.Skat and his fellow kittens made their sneaky plan to kidnap Pios for their fine dinner.
Now, it’s your time to join Como's epic journey and rescue his beloved sisters!

SIMPLE AND EASY CONTROL
- Jump and run are two essentials for side-scroller, but that's not all indeed!
- Try more than 10 different actions performable using two buttons

CHALLENGING STAGES
- 77 stages full of tricks and traps
- Try to collect all stars by clearing more than 200 achievements

AMAZING WORLD THEMES
- From grassy land to scorching desert and sandy beach to simmering volcanic land
- Your discovery is the progress to the next step. Go for it now!

FUN MODES
- Try all 5 different modes ranging from saving Pios to racing the clock
- Epic boss battle at the end of each zone!

SKATS AND SISTERS
- Skats are everywhere prowling for Pio
- Beat them up before they snatch her from Como!

Please note
※ You need no internet connection during the gameplay, except when you are purchasing.

Like us on Facebook
